title: [Azaton's Weaponry]
[Azaton's General Store]
[Azaton's Combat Gear]
[Azaton's Outfitting]
description: The broad sweep of the oak floor is interrupted by a pile of striped throw pillows.  Halfway to the beam ceiling, a blue watered silk tapestry hangs on one of the mahogany paneled walls.  A staved-in treasure chest and a gilded maple cabinet are pushed close together in the back of the shop.
